pages.text: Tajak tron bandum Kamoe kheun meuhat Teubiet bak teumpat churuga indah Teuka peutunyok bak gata meuhat Soe nyang tem pakat ikot peurintah Bak peutunyok Lon jiikot ligat Han le teumakot hana le gundah
Teuma nyang kaphe han pateh ayat Nuraka teumpat keu jih geukeubah Keukai dum sinan sabe meularat Apui tutong that hana peue peugah

Hai cot Israil Tuhan kheun meuhat Taingat beu that keu nikmat Allah Padumna Lon bri keu gata nikmat Beuna taingat janji ngon Allah Janji deungon Lon beu tapeuteupat Di Lon pih meuhat meunan Lon balah Teuma keu Lon nyoe beu tatakot that

Meuiman ligat keu kitab Allah Keu gata bandum Lon peutron Kitab Lagee ban sot that hana meuubah Lagee nyang ka na bak gata meuhat Teuma bek sisat kaphe keu Allah Bek roh takaphe keu asoe kitab Bek peubloe ayat deungon yum murah Beu tatakwa keu Lon nyoe beu that
Bek tapeusapat beuna ngon salah Tasom nyang beuna tacok nyang sisat Tateupue meuhat atra nyan salah
Pubuet seumbahyang tabri ngon zakeut Taruku‘ sujud bandum keu Allah
Keu peue tayue gop pubuet jroh-jroh that Di gata meuhat hana taindah Padahai gata dum tabeut kitab Akai teuh le that ho ka takeubah
Talakee tulong ngon saba beu that Seumbahyang meuhat pubuet lom bagah Teuma seumbahyang cit meunyuem that brat Meu kon bak umat khusyu‘ keu Allah
Umat nyang yakin akan jilihat Meureumpok meuhat dudoe ngon Allah Bandum cit jiwoe keudeh dum meuhat Yakin jih that-that hana meuilah
Hai cot Israil taingat beu that Padumna nikmat Neubri le Allah Nikmat dum Lon bri keu gata meuhat Lagi leubeh that gata Lon peugah Ngon bandum alam gata leubeh that

Teuma bek lambat takwa keu Allah Beu na tatakot uroe nyang hebat Barangsoe meuhat han ek jibalah Takeumeung balah keu rakan sahbat Bandum hana wat laen bak Allah Han ek meusidroe lakee chupeu‘at Barangri umat sinan han leupah Hana soe tulong meu kon Hadharat Uroe nyan beu that takot sileupah
